geek.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: someone who is not popular because they wear unfashionable clothes, do not know how to behave in social situations, or do strange things
geek.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: someone who knows a lot about a technical subject, usually computers, but who is not good at communicating with people
geek.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: He is a 15-year-old computer geek who spends all day gaming.
